Package org.hiphap

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hiphap.FileManager
  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class only holds static methods meant to help with writing to and reading from files on disk.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileManager()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static void exportCsvData()

      Deserialize an Object from binary data in a file.

      Print a report under the "reports" folder, for a particular Event object, containing a summary of all the data associated with it.

      Sends out the notifications to the subscribed parties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileManager

        public FileManager()

    • Method Detail

      • printNotifications

        public static boolean printNotifications​(Event event)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends out the notifications to the subscribed parties. In our system, this is just simulated by creating a file under the "notifications" folder and writing them there. The filename is generated based on the Event object's name.
        Parameters:
        event - the Event to whose subscribed parties to send notifications to
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one party found that subscribed to notifications
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is any error while writing the file to disk

      • exportCsvData

        public static void exportCsvData()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Export Employee, Organization, and Person data to csv files under the "exported_data" folder. The associated files are called, in turn, "employees.csv", "organizations.csv", and "persons.csv". These are overwritten if the already exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is any error while writing the files to disk

      • printEventReport

        public static void printEventReport​(Event event)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Print a report under the "reports" folder, for a particular Event object, containing a summary of all the data associated with it. The file name is generated based on the Event object's name.
        Parameters:
        event - the Event based on which to generate the report
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is any error while writing the file to disk

      • loadBinaryDataFromFile

        public static java.lang.Object loadBinaryDataFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Deserialize an Object from binary data in a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file whose contents are to be deserialized
        Returns:
        an Object holding the data from the file

      • saveBinaryDataToFile

        public static void saveBinaryDataToFile​(java.lang.String filename,
                                        java.lang.Object object)
        Serialize an Object as binary data and write it to a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to which to write
        object - the Object to be written
